1.content:
You awaken on a crisp fall morning, tired and groggy. You are just finishing up summer break and in just 2 weeks are going to be headed back to college for your junior year. You can hear your brother playing in his room. Just 1 year ago you were forced to be with him, helpless and scared, but somehow you made it back from the brink of death and resumed your life thereafter. You know noone would ever believe you, so you quickly stopped trying to explain. The the whailing of your baby sister-- born just 8 months ago --crying and your mother helping her up. You sit up in bed glad to have a good nights rest, you get up and change.

As you walk outside your room you see your mom busy with the children, Mikey in particular bugs you, he has no memory of the torture of what he did to you and he is still in pull-ups. What a brat! You think as you walk down the hall. You have learned to watch your back nowadays, But with all the care you think of it as impossible for it to happen again. You are being very careful and watchful.

Not Careful Enough..

15113.content:
You were babysitting your 4 year old brother while your mother and baby sister were at the mall. You went to check on him when you see him playing with what looked like a toy gun. The gun went off and struck Mickey in the chest. He began glowing and then started growing. His pants and shoes started getting tighter until they ripped. The gun, his shirt and pull-up, both with Lightning McQueen printed on them, was growing with him. You run out of the house as Mikey filled up his room. You got out just as the house crumbled around the growing Mikey. When his growth stopped, he was 200 feet tall. Just them your mother and baby sister arrived home. Your mother asked what happened. Before you could answer, a massive hand grabbed the three of you. You were lifted up to Mikey’s smiling face. He said that he was going to save you guys and put you in his shirt pocket along with the gun. The gun was bigger than any of you, thus was only usable by Mikey.

As the neighbors came out to see what the commotion was. They were surprised to see a giant toddler sitting amongst the rubble of a house. What they didn’t know was that Mikey loved to play as a giant and squish bugs. Now he had thousands at his feet. He smiled and picked up several nearby people. He smiled at the terrified people. He yelled “Save you toys in pull-up”. These people screamed as Mikey pulled out the waistband of his pullup and dropped the people inside. The rest ran away in a panic. This just made Mikey giggle and he started walking after them. A few minutes later 50 of the little bugs were trapped in his pull-up. He sat down, somehow crushing nobody, and giggled as the bugs squirmed inside.

A minute later, Mike stood up and looked around the neighborhood. He smiled as he lifted his foot up and hovered it about a house. He yelled bye bye as he lowered his foot onto the house and it crumbled beneath it. Mike just started giggling. He turned around and crushed another house. He started walking after a group of people running. One person tripped and looked up at the giant toddler above him. Mikey just smiled and raised his foot. The person screamed as Mikey stomped down and crushed him into paste. “Hehehe, bug squished.” He stomped after the others and squished them all in a couple minutes. He started skipping around the town crushing buildings and people.

With his neighborhood reduced to rubble, Mikey turned his attention to the nearby big city. These people started panicking as soon as the giant toddler walked into the city. Mikey felt a familiar feeling inside him. He smiled and walked over to a building that was half his height. He ripped off the roof smiled at the terrified bugs inside. He continued smiling as he opened his pull-up to check on the people inside. They were fine, but Mikey knew they wouldn’t be soon. He sat down and the little bugs panicked as the blue sky was replaced by a blue pull-up diaper.

He pulled out the front of his pull-up and started peeing. He giggled as the bugs inside were desperately trying to avoid drowning, but it was no use. “It’s funny watching bugs stwuggle in pull-up. The Lightning McQueen on the pull-up faded. They weren’t suffering long as the building started creaking. The building collapsed and Mikey landed with a crunch as the people in his pull-up were crushed.

Mikey was giggling and then he started to feel hungry. He saw a car trying to get away. He stomped down if front of it and it skidded to a stop. He picked the car up and lifted it up to his face. He smiled at the terrified little man inside. “What toy car taste like, he asked? The man begged for his life saying that he wasn’t a bug. Mikey replied, “Well now you is num-nums”. With that he tossed the car in his mouth and swallowed. “Mm, little bug was yummy.” With that he walked over to the airport. A plane tried to take off but Mikey stomped on it, crushing it and blocking the runway. He started picking up planes and ripping them in half. A few unlucky people fell to their deaths while the others were eaten with the planes. His stomach was filled with in a few minutes.

He walked over the airport building with a central hub and the terminals leading out of it. He smiled and sat down on the central hub. He crushed the central hub and hundreds of people beneath his soaked pull-up, and he trapped the other people that were in the terminals. He smiled, stood up, and sat down on one of the terminals. He repeated this with each terminal until the airport was crushed. He walked back into the city, smashing through the control tower in the process. He was walking after a group of several dozen people. He collapsed a building into the street and jumped in front of his toys. He collapsed another building so the bugs had nowhere to go. He smiled at the little bugs and turned around. He patted his wet pull-up and the people started screaming. He sat down and crushed several people beneath his butt. “Buggies crunchy.” He got up and sat down again, crushing several more people. “Toys meet diaper.” He kept doing this until all the little bugs were stains on his pull-up.

His pull-up started to annoy him. So he trapped a group and told them to change him. He sat down and crushed another building to convince them. They agreed and he picked them up and walked over to a baby supplies store and set them back down. He ripped off the roof and tossed it aside. He grabbed all the baby powder, wipes, and pull-ups that were in the store. He took out the toy gun and put most of the supplies in his pocket. He fired the gun at one of the pull-ups, again with Lightning McQueen prints on it, and it grew into the perfect size for him. He put the gun back into his pocket. He sat down, crushing the supplies store beneath his pull-up. He smiled and lay down, crushing a few more buildings.

They climbed up his legs and undid the Velcro tabs on the pull-up. The weight caused it to fall down with a splat. As they tried to clean him up, he sat up and crushed a few people into the pull-up. The others cleaned him up with the pull-up and some wipes. They slid it out from beneath him. They sprinkled a couple bottles of baby powder on him so that he wouldn’t get a rash. Once that was done, Mikey stood up. He grabbed the pull-up and slipped it on. He smiled at the people that changed him. He picked them up and shoved them into the pull-up. He grabbed the old one and took it to the dump. He looked around him wondering what to do next.

There was a loud squish and the crotch area of her diaper was stained red from the blood of the people she just squished. Kate was also tired of her full diaper. So she yelled for the survivors to change her diaper. The bugs got to work and made her 100 diapers.

Once they were finished, they told her to lie down. She lay down, crushing several buildings, and spread her legs to allow the people to change the bulging diaper. The bugs opened up a new diaper and slid it beneath her. They climbed up her massive diaper and undid the diaper. The diaper fell down with a loud squish. The bugs screamed as they saw the massive amount of pee and poop inside the diaper. They knew they had to continue or they would be killed. They used the old diaper to clean her up. Then the people got some cranes and moved the full diaper to the dump. When they got back, they put on the baby powder so Kate wouldn't get a rash. They pulled the new diaper up and taped it on. When Kate felt them velcro the diaper in place, she sat up. She stood up and scooped up 25 bugs and stuffed them into her diaper. The rest of the bugs started running and screaming. Kate followed them and it only took her a few minutes to toss all 100 "bugs" that had changed her into the new diaper. She sat back down, but luckily for the people inside the diaper they weren't squished. What does she do now.
1513122111.title: diaper change

1513122112.content:
Katie looked at the city around her. She thought that the city was a perfect toy for her. She licked the feeling of people being crushed. She started walking forward again. The people inside the diaper were thrown about as she walked. As she caught up to a group of 100 little bugs, she lifted up her foot and slammed it down. There was a loud crunch as several people were squished and a giant footprint was left in the street. The others just kept running. Katie continued walking after them. With each step she squished a few more people, making her giggle. It only took her a few minutes to squish all 100 little people. "Hehe bwugs squish beneath foot."

By now she was getting a little tired of walking. She fell forward onto her hands and knees and started crawling down the street. Then she found an even bigger group of 150 people running away. She started crawling after them. As the little people turned a corner, they saw that the street was blocked by rubble. As they turned around Katie had just turned the corner and trapped them. She sat back down, and there was a loud crunch. The people inside her diaper were crushed. Her captives screamed as they heard the crunch and saw some of her diaper turn red. She giggled and yelled out, "You turn". They screamed as Katie stood up a little bit and turned around. Her diaper was right above them. She giggled as she sat down crushing dozens of little people beneath her diaper. The last they saw was a giant red stain and a few princesses before they were squished. Katie giggled, got up again, and sat back down crushing even more. She did this a couple more times. When she was done there were about 15 survivors. She picked them up and brought them to her face.

The terrified little bugs screamed as they looked into her playful eyes. She was thinking what to do with them. Then a loud rumble was heard and Katie smiled as she patted her belly. Her captives knew what was going to happen and started to panic. Katie said, "fwood". She opened up her mouth and shoved all 15 people inside. She sucked on them for a little bit, savoring their flavor. Then she swallowed them whole with a loud 'gulp'. The people around her screamed as they watched a bulge appear in her throat. She patted her belly as the people squirmed, desperately trying to avoid digestion. It was no use and all 15 people were mush within a few minutes. "Bwugs dewicious" Katie yelled out.

She stood back up, letting her diaper sag. She noticed a nearby building was about level with the bottom of her diaper. She stepped over to the building and ripped off the roof. The people screamed as they saw the smiling face of a giant baby. She sat down on top of the building. The people were screaming at the sight of a giant blood stained diaper. They were also gagging from the smell because the diaper was so full. The building started to creak and the people could see cracks forming along the walls. There was a puff of smoke and the building collapsed. When the smoke had cleared, Katie was still giggling away. "Building go boom beneath diapa." Now she yelled for the remaining people to change her diaper or they would live in it. What do they do?
1513122112.title: Squishy people
